column5: Employee trained for task and reviewed installation instructions (product QR code / manufacturer's website / instruction manual)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
Material type as per approved sample submission with AGA or watermarks
Welding , press fittings, witness marks visually checked
Water meters installed to authority standards
Gas 25mm separation achieved from other services as per AS 5601.1
Penetrations, fire protection, wall sealant installed to the BCA requirements
Identifications of services, valves & meters to standards
Final sign off - Pass when satisfied to proceed (Any issues please comment & Add photos below)
